title: How To Configure a Knowledge Base for Your Voice Agent in iMash
lede: This guide explains how to connect a Knowledge Base to your AI agent in Imash, allowing it to provide accurate answers from external documents such as FAQs or support files.

steps.title: Access the Agent Builder
steps.content:
1. Navigate to Call Center ‚Üí AI Agents.
  2. Create a new agent or open an existing one.

steps.title: Upload a Knowledge Base File
steps.content:
1. Locate the Knowledge Base section in the Agent Configuration Panel.
  2. Click Upload File and select the document you want to add (e.g., PDF, TXT).
  3. Wait for the system to process and embed the file. If the file was uploaded before, the system will notify you.

steps.title: Verify Knowledge Base Integration
steps.content:
1. Open the Test Window and connect to your agent.
  2. Ask questions related to the uploaded document (e.g., business hours or support email).
  3. The agent should respond with the correct information from the Knowledge Base.

steps.title: Improving Knowledge Base Accuracy
steps.content:
• If the agent struggles to answer from the file, update the Instruction Prompt to guide its behaviour.
  • Example instruction: ‚ÄúWhen asked a question, answer from the FAQ in your knowledge base.‚Äù

steps.title: Best Practices
steps.content:
• Use clear and structured documents (e.g., FAQs, policy manuals, contact details).
  • Keep files updated to ensure agents provide current information.
  • For multiple topics, upload separate files per category for easier management.
